name: Timelings
description:
Short proof of concept made for DeSpaceJam https://itch.io/jam/de-space-jam

Play as a five dimensional being trying to guide 3.5 dimensional lemmings timelings to the goal.

  • WASD/Arrows to move
  • Page Up/Page Down to move more
  • Right Click to Rotate
  • Left Click to interact
  • Mouse wheel zoom in/out

Download/Extract to play.

Main song: Psychedelic by https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music
